Name: DailyHeartlandsNews/YharmyMobilization
Body: High-ranking Godseeker Knights have declared the 'Yharmy' initiative operational. Six elite units, each bearing relics of fallen gods, will conduct 'cleansing operations' in regions with residual divine energy. A leaked missive states: 'The Age of False Idols ends now.' Notably, the units include a defected Archmage and a figure referred to only as 'the Phoenix's Shadow.'
